item.title: Simulating Star Cluster Formation
item.description: - Movie of a simulation of star cluster formation. It shows the density (left) and temperature (right) of the gaseous cloud. The cyan dots represent stars. Related publication: C.-C. He, M. Ricotti & S. Geen (2019, in preparation). “Simulating Star Clusters Across Cosmic Time: I. Initial Mass Function, Star Formation Rates and Efficiencies”

This webpage is under construction … I’m a third-year graduate student at the University of Maryland studying theoretical and computational astrophysics. My current research focuses on simulating star formation in the early universe.
